sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Cdrdao package contains cdrdao, cue2toc and toc2cue.

sect3.title: cdrdao
sect3.para: cdrdao records audio or data CD-Rs in disk-at-once (DAO) mode based on a textual description of the CD contents.

sect3.title: cue2toc, toc2cue
sect3.para: cue2toc and toc2cue convert CUE to TOC format (and vice versa) for audio CDs.
